code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 4'b0000;  // Reset the counter to 0
    end else begin
        q <= q + 4'b0001;  // Increment the counter
    end
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

iterations.code:
```verilog
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 4'd0;  // Reset the counter to 0
    end else begin
        q <= q + 4'd1;  // Increment the counter
    end
end

endmodule
```
issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
